articles.description: India spinner Ravichandran Ashwin pulls out of the third Test against England in Rajkot because of a family emergency.
articles.title: Ashwin out of third Test over family emergency

articles.description: Six-time Olympic cycling champion Sir Chris Hoy says he is "optimistic, positive and surrounded by love" after revealing cancer diagnosis.
articles.title: Sir Chris Hoy: Six-time Olympic champion 'surrounded by love' after revealing cancer diagnosis

articles.description: Manchester City end Chelsea's 22-game unbeaten run at home to move level on points at the top of the Women's Super League table.
articles.title: Man City win at Chelsea to go level at top of WSL

articles.description: Tiger Woods is forced to withdraw due to illness in the second round of his PGA Tour return at the Genesis Invitational in California.
articles.title: Tiger Woods withdraws on PGA Tour return due to illness

articles.description: After Xavi announced he would be leaving Barcelona this summer. Spanish football expert Guillem Balague looks at why.
articles.title: Isolated, disrespected & lacking support - why Xavi is quitting Barca

articles.description: Ben Duckett's scintillating century leads a breathtaking England counter-attack on the second day of the third Test against India in Rajkot.
articles.title: Thrilling Duckett century leads England counter

articles.description: One woman died and more than 20 others were injured when gunfire erupted at the Kansas City parade.
articles.title: Two teenagers charged over shooting at Kansas City Super Bowl parade
Southampton win at West Brom to go second

articles.description: Edinburgh score three second-half tries to fight back against Zebre and move up to fourth in the United Rugby Championship table.
articles.title: Edinburgh fight back to beat Zebre and move fourth

articles.description: Munster pick up a bonus-point win at Scarlets as the United Rugby Championship returns from the international break.
articles.title: Six-try Munster thrash Scarlets as URC resumes
